token.aboutMe: My name is Dmitry, and I love creating things that live on the Internet. I am passionate about bringing both the technical and visual aspects of digital products to life. User experience, beautiful pixels, and writing clean, accessible code are all important to me. I pay attention to detail because it creates perfection.
token.servicesDesc: I am a hard-working and quality-oriented Junior Front-end Developer looking for an entry-level position with a company to use my skills in programming, solving complex problems and helping to complete projects on time.
token.web: I create web pages that look good on all devices. Your site will look good on all types of devices (desktops, tablets and phones).
token.dev: I develop websites from simple one-page landing pages to complex multi-page corporate websites.
token.cms: I create sites for Wordpress. What I like about Wordpress is that you can create a professional looking website with tons of functionality without breaking the bank.
token.maintenance: I am engaged in the maintenance of the website and tasks related to its support, proper and up-to-date functioning and appearance.
token.message: Send me your message or details of the project you'd like me to be involved in and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
token.descr: AGAMI Dentistry is a leading clinic in Kharkiv
token.Ім'я та прізвище має містити тільки букв: Name and surname must contain only letters
token.Повідомлення відправлено. Дякую!: The message has been sent. Thank you!
token.Будь ласка, введіть ваше ім'я та прізвищ: Please enter your first and last name.
token.Ім'я та прізвище має містити тільки букв: Name and surname must contain only letters.
token.Будь ласка, введіть дійсну адресу електр: Please enter a valid email address.
token.Введіть номер телефону у форматі: +380-X: Enter the phone number in the format: +380-XX-XXX-XX-XX.
token.Ваше повідомлення має містити принаймні: Your message must be at least 10 characters long.
